data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Board of Directors has appointed Dr. Shalini Sarin as an Independent Director of the Company for a period of five consecutive years w.e.f. March 30 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Appointment Of Independent Director And Internal Auditors
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of Polyplex Corporation Limited (Company) at their meeting held on March 27 2025 have considered and approved:
A. Appointment of Dr. Shalini Sarin (DIN: 06604529) as an Additional Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company with effect from March 30 2025 for a period of five consecutive years.

She is not debarred from holding the office of a director pursuant to any order passed by the SEBI or any such authority.

B. Appointment of Protiviti India Member Private Limited as Internal Auditors of the Company for a period of three years from April 1 2025 to March 31 2028

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30- Commencement Of Commercial Production In USA
data.news_body:
Polyplex USA LLC USA a wholly owned subsidiary of Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited which in turn is a subsidiary of the Company after completion of successful trial runs  has commenced commercial production of the following projects:
1. New brownfield BOPET Thin Film Line with a capacity of 50000 MTPA taking the total capacity in USA to 81000 MTPA
2. Capacity debottlenecking of the existing PET resin plant from 58000 MTPA to 86000 MTPA

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Trading Window shall remain closed from April 1 2025 till the completion of 48 hours after the declaration of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter/ year ended March 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30- Commissioning Of New Projects In USA.
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that Polyplex USA LLC (PU) a wholly owned subsidiary of Polyplex Thailand Public Company Thailand (PTL) which in turn is a subsidiary of the Company has commissioned and started trial runs of the following projects:
1. New brownfield BOPET Thin Film Line with a capacity of 50000MTPA taking the total capacity to 81000MTPA
2. Capacity debottlenecking of the existing PET resin plant from 58000MTPA to 86000MTPA.

The commercial production on these projects is expected to commence in next few days.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Strikes /Lockouts / Disturbances
data.news_body: Production at Company''s manufacturing plant at Khatima in District Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand has been suspended effective morning of July 8, 2024 due to heavy rain resulting in flood like situation.Loss/damage of property/machine etc is being estimated. there is no loss of life. Company has adequate insurance including loss of profit.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Regulation 30, 33 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 For Unaudited Financial
Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting held on August 10, 2023 have approved unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023.
Accordingly, we enclose herewith Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023, along with Limited Review Report as received from Auditors.

We are also arranging to upload above on our website www.polyplex.com .

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter - Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on February 13, 2023 have approved following:
1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter - nine months ended December 31, 2022;
2) Declaration and payment of Second Interim Dividend (Special) for the Financial Year 2022-23 @ Rs. 30 per share of the face value of Rs. 10 - each, subject to TDS - Withholding Tax;
3) ''Record date'' for the purpose of payment of aforesaid Dividend has been fixed as February 24, 2023 and is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022 And Declaration Of Second Interim Dividend (Special) For The Financial Year 2022-23 And Fixation Of Record Date.
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on February 13, 2023 have approved following:
1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter / nine months ended December 31, 2022;
2) Declaration and payment of Second Interim Dividend (Special) for the Financial Year 2022-23 - Rs. 30 per share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each, subject to TDS/ Withholding Tax;
3) ''Record date'' for the purpose of payment of aforesaid Dividend has been fixed as February 24, 2023 and is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23 (9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23 (9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the details of related party transactions on
Standalone and consolidated basis and balances for the half year ended on September 30,
2021.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Investor Presentation on Q2 unaudited financial results for the Financial Year 2021-22

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on November 14, 2021 have approved the following:

1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.
2) Declaration and payment of Interim Dividend (Second) for the Financial Year 2021-22 @ Rs. 15/- (Rupees Fifteen only) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each subject to TDS/Withholding Tax. 'Record date' for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend (Second) for the Financial Year 2021-22 has been fixed as November 25, 2021 and Interim Dividend (Second) is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for  Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on November 14, 2021 have approved the following:

1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.
2) Declaration and payment of Interim Dividend (Second) for the Financial Year 2021-22 @ Rs. 15/- (Rupees Fifteen only) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each subject to TDS/Withholding Tax. 'Record date' for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend (Second) for the Financial Year 2021-22 has been fixed as November 25, 2021 and Interim Dividend (Second) is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

data.news_body:
presentation on Q1 Unaudited Financial Results for the
Financial Year 2021-22.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 14, 2021 Meeting Was Commenced At About 1050 Hours (IST) And Concluded At About 1315 Hours (IST).
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on August 14, 2021 have approved the following:

1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.
2) Declaration and payment of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2021-22 @ Rs. 33/- (Rupees Thirty Three only) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each subject to TDS/Withholding Tax. 'Record date' for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2021-22 has been fixed as August 26, 2021 and Interim Dividend is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

Accordingly, we enclose herewith the following:

a) Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with Limited Review Report from Auditors.

b) Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021, along with Limited Review Report from Auditors.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 14, 2021 Meeting Was Commenced At About 1050 Hours (IST) And Concluded At About 1315 Hours (IST
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on August 14, 2021 have approved the following:

1) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.
2) Declaration and payment of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2021-22 @ Rs. 33/- (Rupees Thirty Three only) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each subject to TDS/Withholding Tax. 'Record date' for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2021-22 has been fixed as August 26, 2021 and Interim Dividend is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

Accordingly, we enclose herewith the following:

a) Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with Limited Review Report from Auditors.

b) Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021, along with Limited Review Report from Auditors.
